about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate web developer specializing in creating modern websites, landing pages, e-commerce solutions, and mobile applications.
about.roleDescription1: As a passionate web developer, I specialize in designing and building modern digital solutions, from landing pages to mobile applications, using technologies like React, Next.js, and Angular.
about.roleDescription2: My expertise spans across web development, e-commerce, and mobile app creation, helping businesses establish a strong online presence.
about.roleDescription3: I believe in the power of modern technologies to solve complex business challenges, and I'm constantly exploring new tools and methodologies to deliver exceptional results.
